source /media/sam/2TB-NVMe/prod/apps/nautilus_nightly/nautilus_nightly_env/bin/activate && python -c "
from nautilus_trader.risk.sizing import PositionSizer, FixedRiskSizer
from nautilus_trader.indicators.average.ema import ExponentialMovingAverage
from nautilus_trader.backtest.engine import BacktestEngine
from nautilus_trader.backtest.node import BacktestNode
from nautilus_trader.persistence.catalog.parquet import ParquetDataCatalog

print('=== API Verification ===')
print(f'PositionSizer: {PositionSizer}')
print(f'FixedRiskSizer: {FixedRiskSizer}')
print()
print('PositionSizer methods:', [m for m in dir(PositionSizer) if not m.startswith('_')])
print()
print('FixedRiskSizer methods:', [m for m in dir(FixedRiskSizer) if not m.startswith('_')])
print()
print(f'EMA: {ExponentialMovingAverage}')
print('EMA methods:', [m for m in dir(ExponentialMovingAverage) if not m.startswith('_')])
print()
print(f'BacktestEngine: {BacktestEngine}')
print(f'BacktestNode: {BacktestNode}')
print(f'ParquetDataCatalog: {ParquetDataCatalog}')
"

source /media/sam/2TB-NVMe/prod/apps/nautilus_nightly/nautilus_nightly_env/bin/activate && python3 -c "
from nautilus_trader.risk.sizing import PositionSizer, FixedRiskSizer
import inspect

# Check PositionSizer
print('=== PositionSizer ===')
print('Is abstract:', inspect.isabstract(PositionSizer))
print('Methods:', [m for m in dir(PositionSizer) if not m.startswith('_')])

# Check FixedRiskSizer 
print('\\n=== FixedRiskSizer ===')
print('Methods:', [m for m in dir(FixedRiskSizer) if not m.startswith('_')])

# Check calculate signature
if hasattr(FixedRiskSizer, 'calculate'):
    sig = inspect.signature(FixedRiskSizer.calculate)
    print('calculate signature:', sig)
" 2>&1

operations.description: Search for Rust vs Cython Bar type issues

operations.command:
source /media/sam/2TB-NVMe/prod/apps/nautilus_nightly/nautilus_nightly_env/bin/activate && python3 -c "
# Test that indicators work with bars
from nautilus_trader.indicators import ExponentialMovingAverage
from nautilus_trader.test_kit.providers import TestInstrumentProvider
from nautilus_trader.model.data import Bar, BarType, BarSpecification
from nautilus_trader.model.enums import AggregationSource, BarAggregation, PriceType
from nautilus_trader.model.identifiers import InstrumentId
from nautilus_trader.core.datetime import secs_to_nanos
import time

# Create an EMA
ema = ExponentialMovingAverage(20, PriceType.LAST)
print('EMA created:', ema)
print('Initialized:', ema.initialized)

# Create a bar specification
instrument_id = InstrumentId.from_str('BTCUSDT.BINANCE')
bar_spec = BarSpecification(1, BarAggregation.MINUTE, PriceType.LAST)
bar_type = BarType(instrument_id, bar_spec, AggregationSource.EXTERNAL)

# Create a test bar
ts = secs_to_nanos(int(time.time()))
bar = Bar(
    bar_type=bar_type,
    open=Price.from_str('100.00'),
    high=Price.from_str('101.00'),
    low=Price.from_str('99.00'),
    close=Price.from_str('100.50'),
    volume=Quantity.from_str('1000'),
    ts_event=ts,
    ts_init=ts,
)
print('Bar created:', bar)

# Try handle_bar
ema.handle_bar(bar)
print('After handle_bar - value:', ema.value)
" 2>&1

source /media/sam/2TB-NVMe/prod/apps/nautilus_nightly/nautilus_nightly_env/bin/activate && python3 -c "
from nautilus_trader.indicators import ExponentialMovingAverage
from nautilus_trader.model.data import Bar, BarType, BarSpecification
from nautilus_trader.model.objects import Price, Quantity
from nautilus_trader.model.enums import AggregationSource, BarAggregation, PriceType
from nautilus_trader.model.identifiers import InstrumentId
from nautilus_trader.core.datetime import secs_to_nanos
import time

# Create an EMA
ema = ExponentialMovingAverage(20, PriceType.LAST)
print('EMA created:', ema)

# Create a bar specification
instrument_id = InstrumentId.from_str('BTCUSDT.BINANCE')
bar_spec = BarSpecification(1, BarAggregation.MINUTE, PriceType.LAST)
bar_type = BarType(instrument_id, bar_spec, AggregationSource.EXTERNAL)

# Create test bars
for i in range(25):
    ts = secs_to_nanos(int(time.time()) + i * 60)
    bar = Bar(
        bar_type=bar_type,
        open=Price.from_str(f'{100.00 + i*0.1:.2f}'),
        high=Price.from_str(f'{101.00 + i*0.1:.2f}'),
        low=Price.from_str(f'{99.00 + i*0.1:.2f}'),
        close=Price.from_str(f'{100.50 + i*0.1:.2f}'),
        volume=Quantity.from_str('1000'),
        ts_event=ts,
        ts_init=ts,
    )
    ema.handle_bar(bar)
    if i == 24:
        print(f'After 25 bars - value: {ema.value:.4f}, initialized: {ema.initialized}')
" 2>&1
